Problem: Design and develop a scalable system to allow the deployment of Smart Traffic Lights across the country
Method: set up the database architecture, and pipelines for data-streaming from ground up

Problem: Identify and categorise data on roads to allow smooth flow of traffic within cities
Method: set up a system that identifies objects (vehicles) from a live stream of videos, and categorise them.
Technical: convolutional neural nets, tensor flow, openCV, pandas, python

Method: develop an algorithm which controls traffic lights based on available traffic data.
Technical: neural networks, reinforcement learning, LSTM, genetic algorithms, maths (matrixes and vectors, calculus), pandas
